# Bloodrager's Kit
## Overview
This kit includes a backpack, a blanket, a belt pouch, a flint and steel, an iron pot, soap, torches (10), trail rations (5 days), and a waterskin.

**Price** 9 gp; **Weight** 27 lbs.

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 202
